changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to the informant and the doors.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
An informant has intel on the elusive Maul and agrees to help you locate the former Sith. Upon arrival at the informant's location, however, Maul’s operatives emerge from a nearby facility.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText: Your contact moves to cower behind cover, suddenly frightened and reluctant to cooperate.

{-} The Rebel mission token represents the informant. Once during his activation, a hero adjacent to the informant can suffer 1 {C} to push him 1 space. That hero may test {K} or {I}. If successful, that hero may push him 2 spaces instead.
{-} Doors are locked. A door is unlocked to Rebels while the informant is adjacent to it.

You start to make your way toward the informant, your weapons ready.

{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
Enter the hideout.

{-} The Rebel mission token represents the informant. Once during his activation, a hero adjacent to the informant can suffer 1 {C} to push him 1 space. That hero may test {K} or {I}. If successful, that hero may push him 2 spaces instead.
{-} Doors are locked. A door is unlocked to Rebels while the informant is adjacent to it.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
You are not the easy prey Maul took you for. He sneers at you and darts into the shadows, his secret base of operations now uncovered, wrecked, and useless. He'll eventually regroup, but for now you can rest assured his plans have been delayed.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Bloody and broken, you tear through the hideout back to the safety of your ship. Behind you, the informant cries out, “Wait! You promised me protection! Don't leave me!!!” You try not to think of his inevitable fate at the hands of Maul.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire receives <color="red">Maul</color> (Seeker of Vengeance) as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Extra Help
globalEvents.eventText: More of Maul's thugs arrive at the scene.

globalEvents.name: The Former Master
globalEvents.eventText: The door opens into an old, decrepit building with dim, unsteady lighting.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
A rust-covered door leads into the facility used by Maul as a hideout.

{-} Doors are locked. A door is unlocked to Rebels while the informant is adjacent to it.

eventActions.theText: Standing in the twilight, Maul, Seeker of Vengeance, snarls, his eyes glowing eerily. "It was a mistake coming here", he growls. With a snap-hiss, his double-bladed lightsaber ignites. Then Maul presses a small button at his belt, and the glow of a personal shield surrounds him.

{-} At the start of <color="red">Maul</color>'s activation, if he has suffered *1* or more {H}, he recovers all {H} and becomes <color="red">Stunned</color>.
{-} <color="red">Maul</color> cannot be defeated during a round in which he has not yet resolved an activation.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Maul</color> is defeated.
Defeat <color="red">Maul</color>.
Maul's thugs are getting ready to defend their master.

You ready your weapons when you spot something strange: A power cell in the corner of the room pulses in exactly the same rhythm as Maul's personal shield. The shield appears to be connected to multiple power sources. If you can find and eliminate them, you might stand a better chance against the former Sith.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The power cell is humming and pulsing as it supports Maul's personal shield with energy.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}). When all terminals are destroyed, <color="red">Maul</color> no longer recovers {H} or becomes <color="red">Stunned</color> at the start of his activation.

eventActions.theText: {-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}). When all terminals are destroyed, <color="red">Maul</color> no longer recovers {H} or becomes <color="red">Stunned</color> at the start of his activation.
Block line of sight to <color="red">Maul</color> and the terminals.
Defeat <color="red">Maul</color>. Power cells destroyed: &Terminals Destroyed&/3

{-} The Rebel mission token represents the informant. Once during his activation, a hero adjacent to the informant can suffer 1 {C} to push him 1 space. That hero may test {K} or {I}. If successful, that hero may push him 2 spaces instead.
{-} Doors are locked. A door is unlocked to Rebels while the informant is adjacent to it.
{-} At the start of <color="red">Maul</color>'s activation, if he has suffered *1* or more {H}, he recovers all {H} and becomes <color="red">Stunned</color>.
{-} <color="red">Maul</color> cannot be defeated during a round in which he has not yet resolved an activation.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}). When all terminals are destroyed, <color="red">Maul</color> no longer recovers {H} or becomes <color="red">Stunned</color> at the start of his activation.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Maul</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Maul Activates
globalEvents.eventText:
Maul snarls, and his personal shield glows as it absorbs the damage.

{-} If <color="red">Maul</color> has suffered *1* or more {H}, he recovers all {H} and becomes <color="red">Stunned</color>.

globalEvents.name: Destroy Power Cell 1
globalEvents.eventText: The power cell explodes into a shower of sparks, and Maul's shield flickers.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The power cell is humming and pulsing as it supports Maul's personal shield with energy.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}). When all terminals are destroyed, <color="red">Maul</color> no longer recovers {H} or becomes <color="red">Stunned</color> at the start of his activation.

globalEvents.eventText: The power cell explodes into a shower of sparks, and Maul's shield flickers.

globalEvents.name: Destroy Power Cell 3
globalEvents.eventText: The power cell explodes into a shower of sparks, and Maul's shield flickers.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 3
entityProperties.theText:
The power cell is humming and pulsing as it supports Maul's personal shield with energy.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}). When all terminals are destroyed, <color="red">Maul</color> no longer recovers {H} or becomes <color="red">Stunned</color> at the start of his activation.

globalEvents.name: Backup
globalEvents.eventText: The door opens into a small storage room. A power cell is humming in the corner.

entityProperties.name: Door 2
entityProperties.theText:
This door leading deeper into the hideout has seen better days.

{-} Doors are locked. A door is unlocked to Rebels while the informant is adjacent to it.

eventActions.theText: More of Maul's thugs are waiting for you here.

globalEvents.name: Operatives
globalEvents.eventText: Behind the door lies an old workshop with a power cell in the corner.

entityProperties.name: Door 3
entityProperties.theText:
This door leading deeper into the hideout has seen better days.

{-} Doors are locked. A door is unlocked to Rebels while the informant is adjacent to it.

eventActions.theText: More of Maul's thugs are waiting for you here.

{-} At the start of <color="red">Maul</color>'s activation, if he has suffered *1* or more {H}, he recovers all {H} and becomes <color="red">Stunned</color>.
{-} <color="red">Maul</color> cannot be defeated during a round in which he has not yet resolved an activation.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}). When all terminals are destroyed, <color="red">Maul</color> no longer recovers {H} or becomes <color="red">Stunned</color> at the start of his activation.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Maul</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
Block access to the terminals.

globalEvents.name: All Terminals Destroyed
globalEvents.eventText: The last power cell explodes, and Maul's personal shield first flickers, then vanishes. The Zabrak growls and spins his lightsaber. "This won't help you. Surrender, you pathetic beings!"

eventActions.theText: Block line of sight to <color="red">Maul</color>.

{-} <color="red">Maul</color> cannot be defeated during a round in which he has not yet resolved an activation.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Maul</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
